original_title: And You Don't Stop: 30 Years of Hip-Hop
overview: The film documents the development of hip hop culture since its inception in the 1970s. With interviews from various figures in the community such as Afrika Bambaataa, Grandmaster Flash, Fab 5 Freddy, KRS-One, MC Hammer and Busy Bee.
title: And You Don't Stop: 30 Years of Hip-Hop
